title: The Coronation of Pepin
description: The Coronation of Pepin; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Written: Brussels, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 22.9 x 18.9 cm (9 x 7 7/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 7v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
